The first movie is "Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark" (1981), directed by Steven Spielberg. This action-packed film follows archaeologist Indiana Jones as he embarks on an adventure to recover a lost ark.

The second movie is "Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade" (1984), directed again by Steven Spielberg. This epic action-adventure film tells the story of archaeologist Indiana Jones, as he embarks on an adventure to locate the Holy Grail.

Both movies are adventures filled with thrilling action sequences, captivating character development, and memorable themes and motifs that bring the stories to life.
